name: Janitor's Roll
description:
You're a janitor, roaming the halls, until you encounter a dice sitting on the floor. You pick it up and roll the dice. You're sent to a randomly selected level. You want to make it back home. You roll the dice over and over again. You never know where you'll go next. Might be another level. Or, it might be your house. Who knows, you might never even make it home.

Submitted for the GMTK Game Jam 2022

Controls

A/D or Arrow Keys = Move

Space/W = Jump

E/Right Shift = Attack

R/Right Ctrl = Interact

Credits

Art and game made by me (TheLuchenator)

Font: Press Start 2P
